product_details_and_care:
Minimalist styling merges with maximum versatility on an Italian leather hobo boasting multiple carrying options, thanks to its top handle and optional crossbody strap. Ample pockets inside and out provide easy organization of the essentials.
Top zip closure
Top carry handle; optional, adjustable crossbody strap
Interior zip, wall and smartphone pockets
Signature Wanderlust print lining
Leather
Imported
Handbags
Item #5635139
product_size_info:
11 ½"W x 8"H x 4"D. (Interior capacity: small.)
10" strap drop; 25" crossbody strap drop.
1.3 lb.
